modName: Free Camera Movement on Jarl Thrones and others
summary: Free Camera Movement on Jarl Thrones and others
descriptionHtml:
Free Camera Movement on Jarl Thrones and others. Removes the forced third person from the thrones.
Now has 3 Versions
Non DLC- No DLC Required
DLC-Dawnguard- Requires Dawnguard
DLC Thrones to Jarl thrones-- Edited all thrones in game to be the Jarl animation when sitting I have not tested but I do not foresee and problems.

If I missed any leave a comment I will get to it sometime lol.

Rare bug
I did have my guy rotate once when I sat down in first person nothing major just got up and sat back down.


[color=yellow][u][b]My other mods[/b][/u][/color]
[color=yellow][u][b]Draco1122[/b][/u][/color]
